title: Dining Room, Pet Friendly, Dishwasher, Walk-In Closets

posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1096 Sq.
Tucked beneath a canopy of trees along a quiet street, the Enclave at Bear Creek takes advantage of its naturally beautiful setting to provide a resort-like apartment community.
Find your next home at Enclave At Bear Creek in Euless, TX and discover what you have been looking for.

Hardwood Floors, Air Conditioning, Crown Molding, Fireplace, Framed Mirrors, Ceiling Fans, Heating, Large Bedrooms, Disposal, Ice Maker, Dishwasher, Pantry, Built-In Bookshelves, Microwave, Dining Room, Walk-In Closets, In Unit Washer & Dryer, High Speed Internet Access, Vaulted Ceiling
Fitness center, Pet Friendly, Clubhouse, Package Receiving, Pool Lounge Seating, Business Center
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $500 pet fee for each pet.
